alice.respect.api

Class TupleCentreId

  • java.lang.Object
    • alice.respect.api.TupleCentreId
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IId, TupleCentreId, java.io.Serializable

    public class TupleCentreId
extends java.lang.Object
implements TupleCentreId, java.io.Serializable
    Tuple centre identifier for ReSpecT tuple centres A tuple centre identifier must be a ground logic term.
    Author:
    aricci
    See Also:
